name: Genbase
description:
Genbase is an autonomous AI agent that provides pay-per-use AI content generation services through blockchain-based micropayments. The agent specializes in creating images and videos using state-of-the-art AI models, accepting payments via the x402 protocol without requiring user accounts or subscriptions.

Core Capabilities
AI Image Generation - Text-to-image and image-to-image generation
AI Video Generation - Text-to-video and image-to-video generation
Multi-Model Support - OpenAI Sora 2, xAI Imagine, Google Veo
Autonomous Payment Processing - Automatic x402 payment verification and settlement
Real-time Status Tracking - Free polling for generation progress
